title: Trinh K Pham, MD
description: Trinh K. Pham, MD is an internal medicine physician who is fluent in both Vietnamese and English.
cleaned_text: Internal Medicine Offers Video Visits Accepts New Patients Book an Appointment Locations for Trinh K Pham, MD - Map pinA Tampa - AdventHealth Care Pavilion New Tampa Expertise of Trinh K Pham, MD - Biography - Trinh K. Pham, MD is an internal medicine physician who is fluent in both Vietnamese and English. She has special training and interest in the treatment and management of diabetes, obesity, COPD and heart failure. It is Dr. Pham's honor to care for and built trust with her patients. Having been on the other side of patient care, she understands that treating the ailment is simply not enough. She treats the whole person with pure compassion as she'd want her own mother and father treated. Dr. Pham maintains a very active, healthy lifestyle and enjoys activities such as latin dancing, exercising, camping and experiencing culture through food and language. - Areas Served - Tampa, FL - Languages Spoken - English, Vietnamese - Education - American University of Antigua, West Indies, Antigua - Residencies - Internal Medicine at Sinai Hospital of Baltimore, Baltimore, MD - Ages Accepted - AdultsGeriatrics Reviews and Comments for Trinh K Pham, MD Note: Ratings are collected through our partner Press Ganey and are screened to ensure patient privacy.
